title: Battle Pack 01
description: 10 battle songs that loop seamlessly. All songs were made with very similar instrumentation, so all of them feel familiar to one another.
longDescription:
Pack of 10 royalty free chiptune songs made for battles! All of them loop seamlessly and are made with very similar instrumentation, so each song feels familiar to one another. The instrumentation includes plugins replicating retro synths, virtual synths made specially for chiptune music, and soundfonts from classic games. The songs have no specific purpose or job, like one for a boss battle, another for a random encounter, etc. That's for you to decide! Each song was carefully composed, produced, mixed, and mastered to sound loud, clean, and professional.


You can listen to the full demo here.
technicalDetails:
Features:


Track List

  • Battle 01 - 1:46
  • Battle 02 - 1:26
  • Battle 03 - 2:12
  • Battle 04 - 2:12
  • Battle 05 - 2:39
  • Battle 06 - 1:37
  • Battle 07 - 2:07
  • Battle 08 - 1:29
  • Battle 09 - 2:01
  • Battle 10 (Intro) - 2:46 (No reverb tail at the beginning, it does not loop seamlessly)
  • Battle 10 (Loop) - 2:46 (Has reverb tail added to the beginning so it loops seamlessly)


Other Features

Number of Audio Wavs: 11

Number of Audio Cues: 11

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 23:01

Supported Development Platforms:
